text: jo kuchh usane tumapar haî€¼raam (avaidh) kiya hai, vah murdaar, rakt aur suar ka maans hai aur jisapar allaah ke siva doosare ka naam liya gaya[1] ho, phir jo bhookh se aatur ho jaaye, is dasha mein ki vah niyam na tod raha[2] ho aur na aavashyakta se adhik khaaye, to vaastav mein, allaah ati kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
